subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms}}
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*m-twa||handspan}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|à½˜à½à½¼||span; span of thumb and middle finger}}, {{cog|my|á€‘á€½á€¬||to measure by a handspan; a quarter yard}}, {{m|my|á€¡á€‘á€½á€¬||handspan; quarter yard}}, {{m|my|á€á€½á€€á€º||to consider, to reckon; to calculate; to refuse to do things because others would not}}, {{m|my|á€¡á€á€½á€€á€º||calculation; because of; for the sake of}}. It is unclear whether {{cog|mkh-pro|*cÉ—aÊ”||span; handspan}} (whence {{cog|mnw|á€|tr=daË€||to measure by spans of thumb and middle finger}}) is related. Related to {{och-l|åœ–|to plan; to consider; plan; map}}.
